body: Just making the speculation explicit is sufficient to convince clang to vectorize the loop where the naïve version did  not get vectorized.
body_html: Just making the speculation explicit is sufficient to convince clang to vectorize the loop where the naïve version did not get vectorized.
body_text: Just making the speculation explicit is sufficient to convince clang to vectorize the loop where the naïve version did  not get vectorized.
